casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 10, 2014

[Cite as 02H0H4 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-429.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2012-2026. State v. Thomas.

Lake C.P. No. 11 CR 000321. This cause is pending before the court as a death-penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas of Lake County.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to unseal portions of the record, it is ordered by the court that the motion is denied. It is further ordered, sua sponte, that counsel in this case and Assistant Public Defenders Randall Porter and Lisa Lagos shall be permitted to come to the clerk’s office to review the sealed portions of the record.
